thread.title: I wish Mass Effect was like The Expanse
thread.title_full: I wish Mass Effect was like The Expanse

author: Alec Meer
title: I wish Mass Effect was like The Expanse
text:
Note: I had this post brewing in my head over the past week, while I was off on holiday, but the good folks at Waypoint ran something apparently similar before I could write it. No matter, as I’m yet to read that piece beyond the headline, I’ll write something anyway, albeit briefer, in the hope it doesn’t entirely replicate it. 
Admittedly I haven’t progressed beyond the 10-hour demo portion of Mass Effect Andromeda yet, and the main reason for that is that I haven’t been much intrigued by its science-fiction.
… [ visit site to read more ]
